com.freshbourne.io
Interface AutoSaveResourceManager

All Superinterfaces:
PageManager<RawPage>, ResourceManager
All Known Implementing Classes:
CachedResourceManager
public interface AutoSaveResourceManager
extends ResourceManager

same as ResourceManager, except that pages don't have to be written back to disk manually. An implementation of this interface makes sure, that pages are persisted if they are altered. This is usually done with a cache in the ResourceManager.

Method Summary
 
Methods inherited from interface com.freshbourne.io.ResourceManager
addPage, clear, close, getPageSize, isOpen, numberOfPages, open, writePage
 
Methods inherited from interface com.freshbourne.io.PageManager
createPage, getPage, hasPage, removePage, sync
